summary: REQ-1 is only partially implemented: a pointer comment was added in `frontend/src/App.tsx` near the admin routes, but there is no evidence that `frontend/src/ADMIN_ROUTES.md` was updated as required. The diff also includes modifications to tracking/summary files that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Keep `frontend/src/ADMIN_ROUTES.md` accurate by explicitly stating admin routes are defined in `frontend/src/App.tsx` and listing the admin paths `/admin/login` and `/admin`.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows changes to `frontend/src/App.tsx` but does not show any change to `frontend/src/ADMIN_ROUTES.md` (and no file with that path appears in the modified list).
evidence: file-diff summary: Modified files list does not include `frontend/src/ADMIN_ROUTES.md`

hallucinated_features.reason: `project_state.json` was modified, but the BuildRequest only asks for documentation/comment changes around admin routes; it does not request project state updates.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated or regenerated repository file summary documentation.
hallucinated_features.reason: `frontend-file-summaries.txt` was modified, but the BuildRequest does not ask to update any file summary index.
